title: Scott Addict Gravel gets Dangerholm-ed to create most custom, integrated carbon gravel bike ever!
content:
Every time we catch wind of a new Dangerholm project we can’t wait to see how crazy custom it will end up, and this latest Scott Addict Gravel project bike certainly doesn’t disappoint. To be fair Gustav Gullholm – the wild man behind the knife and short jorts – had a more integrated starting point

The post Scott Addict Gravel gets Dangerholm-ed to create most custom, integrated carbon gravel bike ever! appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Cory Benson
